author: xtqqczze
body:
4 violations of [CA2241](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca2241): Provide correct arguments to formatting methods

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/f4ac0935c530be5b33c3fc043b574b95d41a1ca5/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Diagnostics/GetEventCommand.cs#L1161

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/f4ac0935c530be5b33c3fc043b574b95d41a1ca5/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Diagnostics/GetEventCommand.cs#L1177

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/f4ac0935c530be5b33c3fc043b574b95d41a1ca5/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Diagnostics/GetEventCommand.cs#L1189

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/f4ac0935c530be5b33c3fc043b574b95d41a1ca5/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Diagnostics/GetEventCommand.cs#L1224

The cause appears to be `suppressOpener` does not contain format items that corresponds to the object arguments:

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/f4ac0935c530be5b33c3fc043b574b95d41a1ca5/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Diagnostics/GetEventCommand.cs#L379
title: Violations of CA2241 in GetEventCommand
